title: This Stock's the Place to Be in 2020
text:
The Children's Place (PLCE) navigated through a few special situations during the past yearThat caused some near-term disruptions, but should end up becoming a larger positive in the years aheadIndustry competitor Gymboree went into bankruptcyGoing out of business liquidations at Gymboree's stores hurt PLCE's sales and earnings in fiscal 2019, whi...

description: After a rare down year, The Children's Place should see fiscal 2020's earnings per share rebound sharply.
authors: This Stock'S The Place To Be In
The Children'S Place Should See Fiscal Earnings Per Share Rebound Sharply.
